revised_title: A Detailed Account of the Extraordinary Thunder and Its Effects Near Aberdeen, Scotland
tldr: The author describes an extraordinary thunderstorm near Aberdeen, Scotland, in 1695, which caused significant damage to a school building and resulted in the death of four people. The author recounts the events and the miraculous survival of his own son, attributing the events to divine Providence.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Meteorology and Climatology
